templates.name: Base Development Container
templates.description: General-purpose development container with network isolation via Squid proxy and iptables firewall.

features.name: Node.js
features.description: Installs Node.js runtime with npm using official binaries from nodejs.org.

features.name: Python
features.description: Installs Python runtime with uv package manager.

features.name: Puppeteer
features.description: Installs Chromium and system dependencies for headless browser automation with Puppeteer.

features.name: Claude
features.description: Installs Claude Code CLI and VS Code extension with persistent configuration mounts.

features.name: GitHub CLI
features.description: Installs GitHub CLI (gh) from official apt repository.

features.name: Firewall
features.description: Enforces network isolation with iptables, blocking direct connections except to proxy.

features.name: Proxy
features.description: Routes all HTTP/HTTPS traffic through Squid proxy and initializes firewall at container start.
